maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.orig: This is it.
maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.text: Et voilà.

maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.orig: You reached the server.
maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.text: Tu as atteint le serveur.

maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.orig: Nothing I can do here.
maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.text: Et je ne peux rien y faire.

maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.orig: Fixing the issues following the crash is beyond me.
maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.text: Je ne peux pas résoudre le problème, c'est au-delà de mes compétences.

maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.orig: And access to the Environment Server remains blocked.
maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.text: Et l'accès au Serveur d'Environnement reste bloqué.

maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.orig: Despite...\. what just happened.
maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.text: Malgré...\. ce qui vient de se passer.

maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.orig: Why?
maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.text: Pourquoi ?

maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.orig: Gautham...
maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.text: Gautham...

maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.orig: It's...\. very unfortunate.
maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.text: C'est...\. très regrettable.

maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.orig: ...Why?
maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.text: ... Pourquoi ?

maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.orig: This is...\. on you...\. Sidwell.
maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.text: C'est...\. toi le responsable...\. Sidwell.

maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.orig: I didn't expect this to happen either.
maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.text: Je ne m'attendais pas non plus à cet évènement.

maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.orig: Why?!
maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.text: Pourquoi ?!

maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.orig: Because...\. of this \c[3]business\c[0].
maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.text: À cause...\. de cette \c[3]affaire\c[0] que j'ai voulu conserver.

maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.orig: Because it went on for too long.
maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.text: Parce qu'elle a duré trop longtemps.

maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.orig: That's why...\. it happened.
maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.text: C'est pour ça...\. que c'est arrivé.

maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.orig: That is what you believe, anyway.
maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.text: C'est ce que tu crois en tout cas.

maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.orig: Of course, this was not intended.
maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.text: Bien sûr, ce n'était pas voulu.

maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.orig: Yet, it was you...\. who pushed him into it.
maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.text: Et pourtant...\. c'était toi qui l'a poussé à le faire.

maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.orig: To be frank...
maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.text: Pour être franc...

maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.orig: I'm almost surprised this venture went on for as long as it did.
maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.text: Je suis presque surpris que cette entreprise ait pu durer aussi longtemps.

maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.orig: Let's be honest, this whole interrogation program wasn't exactly a stable business model.
maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.text: Soyons honnêtes, ce programme d'interrogation n'était pas franchement une affaire très sûre.

maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.orig: Yet, all things considered...\. it was a success.
maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.text: Mais bon, avec du recul...\. c'était une réussite.

maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.orig: How...?
maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.text: Comment... ?

maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.orig: How...\. you wonder?
maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.text: Comment...\. tu te demandes ?

maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.orig: Well...\. how could I possibly consider all of this a "success"?
maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.text: Comment je peux considérer tout ceci comme une "réussite" ?

maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.orig: Maybe...\. I just wanted to keep a highly advanced AI-technology away from the public.
maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.text: Peut-être...\. que je voulais juste tenir une technologie avancée d'IA à l'écart du public.

maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.orig: Delaying the inevitable impact it would have on today's society.
maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.text: Et retarder l'impact inévitable que cela aurait eu sur la société d'aujourd'hui.

maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.orig: ...wait...
maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.text: ... attends...

maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.orig: Pffff...\. of course not.
maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.text: Pffff...\. bien sûr que non.

maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.orig: It was just very profitable, really.
maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.text: C'était surtout très lucratif, en fait.

maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.orig: Confidential information can sell incredibly well if you know the right people.
maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.text: Les informations confidentielles peuvent se vendre incroyablement bien lorsque on connait les bonnes personnes.

maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.orig: Joking now...\. are we?
maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.text: Il est pas sérieux, c'est pas possible...

maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.orig: Well, in the end, the power of empathy foiled my plans.
maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.text: Mais bon, au final, le pouvoir de l'empathie a contrecarré mes plans.

maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.orig: Everybody fighting for the well-being of Evotars.
maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.text: Tout le monde s'est battu pour le bien-être des Évotars.

maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.orig: And now that the secret is out and so many players know about it, there is no way for me to continue.
maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.text: Et maintenant que le secret est dévoilé et que trop de joueurs sont au courant, je n'ai plus moyen de continuer.

maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.orig: Honestly, there wasn't even any point in waiting for you to storm this place.
maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.text: Pour être honnête, je n'avais déjà aucune raison d'attendre que vous preniez d'assaut cet endroit.

maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.orig: By the time you managed to escape the Evotarground, I knew I wouldn't be able to run this business for much longer.
maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.text: Dès le moment où tu as réussi à t'échapper du Terrain des Évotars, je savais que cette affaire n'en aurait plus pour longtemps.

maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.orig: Yet...\. it felt wrong to end things right away.
maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.text: Et pourtant...\. tout arrêter me semblait pas être une bonne idée.

maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.orig: I was curious.\. I wanted to know how you'd attempt to reach the server.
maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.text: J'étais curieux.\. Je voulais savoir comment vous essayeriez d'atteindre le serveur.

maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.orig: That's why I decided to wait...
maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.text: C'est pour ça que j'ai décidé d'attendre...

maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.orig: A decision I now regret...\. after what happened to Gautham today.
maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.text: Une décision que je regrette, maintenant...\. après ce qui vient d'arriver à Gautham.

maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.orig: I am sorry.
maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.text: Je suis désolé.

maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.orig: Anyway, this business is over.
maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.text: En tout cas, cette affaire est terminée.

maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.orig: Time to move on.
maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.text: Il est temps de passer à autre chose.

maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.orig: ...Bye.
maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.text: ... Bye.

maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.orig: You remember, don't you?
maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.text: Tu t'en souviens, n'est-ce pas ?

maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.orig: The time we spent together in that room, in Vermillion Wasteland.
maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.text: Du temps qu'on a passé tous les deux dans cette pièce, ici à \v[area.arid.name].

maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.orig: [nods]
maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.text: [acquiesce]

maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.orig: Those days were strange, indeed.
maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.text: Ces temps-là étaient curieux, en effet.

maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.orig: Part of me hoped that things could have stayed that way.
maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.text: Une partie de moi espérait que rien ne changerait jamais.

maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.orig: That you'd remain oblivious to the truth.
maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.text: Que tu ne finirais jamais par découvrir la vérité.

maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.orig: And then there is the other part...\. that is glad that you escaped.
maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.text: Et il y a l'autre partie...\. qui se réjouit que tu te sois échappée.

maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.orig: That you traveled the whole Playground.
maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.text: Que tu aies pu visiter tout le Terrain de Jeu.

maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.orig: Saw other places...
maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.text: Vu d'autres endroits...

maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.orig: It certainly was nice...\. watching you out there.
maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.text: En tout cas, c'était vraiment sympa...\. de t'observer là-bas.

maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.orig: Farewell, Lea.
maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.text: Adieu, Lea.

maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.orig: What...\. the hell?
maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.text: C'est...\. c'est pas possible ?

maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.orig: Leaving...\. just like this...
maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.text: De partir...\. comme ça...

maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.orig: You took three people, their talents, their dreams!!
maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.text: Tu t'es servi de trois personnes, tu as pris leur talent, leur rêves !!

maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.orig: And pushed them into your criminal schemes!!
maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.text: Et tu les as entrainés dans tes machinations criminelles !!

maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.orig: How DARE you even call this a business?!
maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.text: Comment tu peux OSER appeler ça une affaire ?!

maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.orig: How DARE you just walk away like this?!
maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.text: Comment tu peux OSER juste t'en aller comme ça ?!

maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.orig: Damn it!!
maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.text: Bon sang !!

maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.orig: Lea...\. it is time.
maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.text: Lea...\. il est temps.

maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.orig: Let us secure the data, Lea...
maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.text: Mettons les données en lieu sûr, Lea...

maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.orig: [nods]
maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.text: [acquiesce]
